subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The ball from the last home run hit at Yankee Stadium will be sold at auction this weekend in New York. The man who snagged it, Steve Harshman of Casper, Wyo., said he had heard estimates that the ball would fetch at least $200,000.
snippet: The ball from the last home run hit at Yankee Stadium will be sold at auction this weekend in New York. The man who snagged it, Steve Harshman of Casper, Wyo., said he had heard estimates that the ball would fetch at least $200,000.
